### Version history

This page provides information about older or alternative versions of  indicative distribution map for this ecosystem functional group [**{{< meta params.efgname >}}**](/efg-info/M2_2.qmd).
Check the current maps [here](/map-info/M2_2_valid.qmd).

- Web navigation (**code: M2.2.web.orig**, version v1.0) discarded 
 - Web navigation (**code: M2.2.WM.nwx**, version v1.0) in preparation 
 - Indicative Map (**code: M2.2.IM.orig**, version v1.0) discarded 

### Datasets

Datasets considered for previous versions of the indicative map

- **EMU-2017** (Sayre et al. 2017).
 - **SRTM30-PLUS-V11** (Becker et al. 2009).

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset         |url                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|:---------------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|EMU-2017        |<https://www.esri.com/en-us/about/science/ecological-marine-units/overview>{target='links'} :: <https://rmgsc.cr.usgs.gov/outgoing/ecosystems/Global/>{target='links'} :: <https://doi.org/10.5670/oceanog.2017.116>{target='links'} :: <https://community.esri.com/groups/ecological-marine-units/blog/2017/01/03/getting-started-with-ecological-marne-units-emu-s-using-arcgis-desktop>{target='links'} |
|SRTM30-PLUS-V11 |<ftp://topex.ucsd.edu/pub/srtm30_plus/>{target='links'} :: <https://topex.ucsd.edu/WWW_html/srtm30_plus.html>{target='links'}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |


:::
:::

### Available files

You can download geospatial data for older versions of these maps from the following sources:

**M2.2.web.orig** (v1.0): [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.M2_2_web_orig){target="gisdata"}

**M2.2.IM.orig** (v1.0): [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958934){target="gisdata"}

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.

###  License information

Indicative maps have been released with a ![](https://zenodo.org/static/icons/licenses/cc-by-icon.svg){height=20} Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license. 

But see details of dataset licenses below:

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset         |license_info                                                                                                         |
|:---------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|EMU-2017        |https://data.amerigeoss.org/dataset/ecological-marine-unit-emu-explorer :: http://opendefinition.org/licenses/cc-by/ |
|SRTM30-PLUS-V11 |https://topex.ucsd.edu/pub/srtm30_plus/topo30/COPYRIGHT.txt                                                          |


:::
:::

## References

References used in these versions of the maps.

- Sayre, R.G., D.J. Wright, S.P. Breyer, K.A. Butler, K. Van Graafeiland, M.J. Costello, P.T. Harris, K.L. Goodin, J.M. Guinotte, Z. Basher, M.T. Kavanaugh, P.N. Halpin, M.E. Monaco, N. Cressie, P. Aniello, C.E. Frye, and D. Stephens (2017) *A three-​dimensional mapping of the ocean based on environmental data* **Oceanography** 30(1):90–103 [DOI:10.5670/oceanog.2017.116](http:dx.doi.org/10.5670/oceanog.2017.116) 
 - Becker JJ, Sandwell DT, Smith WHF, Braud J, Binder B, Depner J, Fabre D, Factor J, Ingalls S, Kim S-H, Ladner R, Marks K, Nelson S, Pharaoh A, Trimmer R, Von Rosenberg J, Wallace G, Weatherall P (2009) *Global Bathymetry and Elevation Data at 30 Arc Seconds Resolution: SRTM30_PLUS*, **Marine Geodesy** 32: 355-371. DOI:[10.1080/01490410903297766](https://doi.org/10.1080/01490410903297766)
